name: olx-category-scraper
description: Simple OLX.uz category scraper with PostgreSQL storage

scripts.get-data: node -e "import('./db.js').then(async (db) => { const sqlite3 = (await import('sqlite3')).default; const { open } = await import('sqlite'); const database = await open({ filename: './categories.db', driver: sqlite3.Database }); const categories = await database.all('SELECT * FROM categories'); const subcategories = await database.all('SELECT s.*, c.name as parent_name FROM subcategories s JOIN categories c ON s.parent_id = c.id'); console.log('Categories:', categories); console.log('Subcategories:', subcategories); await database.close(); })"

author: Your Name
